question: What is the name of the project in design that has the earliest construction start date?
sub_query: List all projects in design with their construction start dates, then identify the project with the earliest construction start date.
final_answer: The project in design that has the earliest construction start date is the Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements. This project is scheduled to begin construction in Spring 2022.
sub_answers:
- Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements (CalOES Project): Begin Construction - Spring 2022
- Malibu Road Slope Repairs (CalOES Project): Begin Construction - Fall 2022
- Westward Beach Road Shoulder Repairs (CalOES Project): Begin Construction - Fall 2022
The project with the earliest construction start date is Encinal Canyon Road Drainage Improvements with a construction start date in Spring 2022.
